resources.string: Locks the app so the user needs to validate as the owner of the phone, it will prompt for fingerprint or passcode when the app first opens and when the app has been in the background for more than 5 minutes.
Protects app on screen information while the app is in the background.
Disable app launch on Jailbroken or rooted devices
Disables the ability to copy or paste from any input in the app
Set the Mattermost server URL users will be using as default.
Allow the user to change the above server URL.
Set the username or email address to use to authenticate against the Mattermost Server.
Name of the EMM vendor or company deploying the app so the users are aware the app is being protected.
